Articles.Content:
Been trying to get to Minmus, and that dang MUN keeps getting in the way........

Lol

Corporal Vasquez

USCSM / KSCSM 8th BMTS Sulaco.
Lol. Try make the transfer burn when the Mun is on the other side of Minmus

I know what you're saying, I had a Mun encounter 3 times this week going to Minmus, sometimes making the journey longer then expected. But a little nudge here or there and it can go to Minmus without much extra fuel consumption.

I once managed a triple-encounter free-return trajectory on the way to Minmus- I don't know how it happened, but I managed to get my trajectory so that it got a Munar slingshot that took me straight to Minmus and then right back for a second Mun flyby. The orbit trajectory didn't draw after that point, but I think it would have gotten me an anti-slingshot from the Mun that would have brought me right back to Kerbin's surface. I didn't follow it through because I wanted to land on Minmus (which I did), but it was a pretty sweet orbit. I think the screenshot is on my parents' computer back home.
I generally take advantage of Mun encounters on the way to Minmus as they can save a bit of dV.
Danny made a planet-destroyer. Not warrantied for use in .24, do not attempt use on Jool.
